name: ARTIFICIAL - DEMO
description:
ARTIFICIAL is a first-person physics based puzzle platformer inspired by Portal & Half-Life series.

Interact with the environment, pick up and throw objects, sneak around enemies, control intricate physics-based mechanisms and learn how to survive in the underground colony of asteroid 2031 XT.


There are many obstacles and traps you will encounter on your journey several thousand meters underground. Some of them more intelligent than the others.


  • Progress through 3-5 hours of original story
  • Solve physics based puzzles and Interact with your surroundings
  • Maneuver around lasers, hide from turrets and sneak around your enemies!
DEMO AVAILABLE!

ARTIFICIAL takes place in the underground colony of the asteroid 2031 XT. The story of the game begins several months after an alien hive-mind entity "The Corruption" has appeared  and began possessing and controlling all human made technology. The player takes control of one of the survivors of this event, currently on their way back from a scavenging mission.

  • DEMO contains first ~30 minutes of the game!
  • All music has been specifically created for the game so you won't run into any copyright issues!
  • Feel free to record and publish your gameplay!

JOIN US ON DISCORD
